alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Jefferson (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 12 at 5:27PM EDT until August 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HARRISON...WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND SOUTH CENTRAL CARROLL COUNTIES... At 526 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 9 miles north of Cadiz, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Fire Department reported a funnel cloud near Scio. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Hopedale, Scio, Jewett, Amsterdam, Unionport, and Kilgore. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
